column2: Dwarf]] in Frerin's Court. He was a member of the company of [[Dwarves]] who were led by [[Dwalin]] in T. A. 3016 to investigate Thorin's Gate on [[Dáin Ironfoot
column3: Dáin II]]'s command.<ref name="return from erebor">[[The Lord of the Rings Online]], [[Ered Luin Introduction
column4: Introduction]], ''Intro: Return from the Lonely Mountain''</ref> The player was sent to him by [[Bolli]] to aid Nos Grimsong with clean up the problems with wild life in Thorin's Gate.<ref name="return from erebor"/> Before Nos can use the player he has to learn more about his class, so Nos sends him to one of the trainers.<ref name="sharpen your skills">[[The Lord of the Rings Online]], [[Ered Luin Introduction
column5: Introduction]], ''Intro: Sharpen your Skills''</ref> After the player has learnt more from the trainers Nos gives him the task to kill a few lynxes, east of Frerin's Court.<ref>[[The Lord of the Rings Online]], [[Ered Luin Introduction
column6: Introduction]], ''Intro:  Restoring the Balance''</reF> After the player is finished Nos sends him to [[Dori]].<ref name="sharpen your skills"/>
